original_prompt: Real-life cinematic photograph of a giant [任何物品] fused with a living tree, vertical cross-section diorama style, real human beings (diverse adult people/professionals/craftsmen) [活动/职业] inside, hollow [核心物件] body contains several wooden floors and rooms connected by ladders, stairs and rope bridges, people [具体动作/使用物品] with natural poses and expressions, visible facial details, pores, hair strands, clothing texture and fabric folds, warm practical lighting from hanging lanterns, vintage lamps and string lights, [核心物件] neck/head/top grows into real tree branches with green leaves and moss, organic bark texture perfectly blending with wood material, set against plain soft grey/dark gray backdrop, captured with high-resolution macro cinema lens, shot on 8K film camera, 50mm f/2.8, razor-sharp focus throughout, shallow depth of field, realistic lens flare and subtle light leaks, natural skin tones, no cartoon, no illustration, no CGI, no digital painting, pure photography, hyper-detailed, masterpiece, (photorealistic:1.4), (real human faces:1.3), (practical lighting only:1.2)
theme: 超现实摄影 / Diorama风格 / 电影级产品摄影

subject_variables.main: Giant object fused with living tree, vertical cross-section diorama
subject_variables.flexibility: 高度可变 - 任何物品、任何职业、任何动作

visual_style.art_style: Real-life cinematic photography with surreal concept

technical_parameters.lighting: warm practical lighting from hanging lanterns, vintage lamps and string lights

composition.focal_element: giant object with multiple interior floors and real human beings
composition.depth_of_field: shallow depth of field with razor-sharp focus
composition.structure: hollow body contains wooden floors and rooms connected by ladders, stairs and rope bridges

special_effects: Organic bark texture blending with wood material

environment.interior: Multiple wooden floors and rooms with ladders, stairs, rope bridges
environment.organic_element: Living tree growing from top with branches, leaves, moss

color_scheme.tone: Natural warm tones with soft grey backdrop
color_scheme.style: Realistic natural colors, natural skin tones
